projects.name: Movie Recommendation Systems
projects.description: Evaluated SVD, NMF, MF-SGD, and CF-KNN techniques for movie recommendation systems. Compared effectiveness, accuracy, and computational efficiency. Included a literature review of 15 research papers. Aimed to improve personalized entertainment recommendations.

projects.name: Road Sign Recognition
projects.description: Designed and implemented a CNN model to classify road signs into 43 categories, using convolutional, maxpooling, dropout, and fully connected layers. Trained the model with categorical crossentropy loss and Adam optimizer, integrating image preprocessing with a pretrained Keras model. Developed a PyQt5 GUI to support image browsing, classification, model training, and visualization of training performance, including model saving and training curve generation.
